title: Maharbawdi (မဟာဗောဓိ)
desc: MahaBawdi is a free-to-air buddhist television channel run by Forever Group. It is based in Yangon, Yangon Region.

title: MRTV-4
desc: MRTV-4 is a 24-hour free-to-air television channel that broadcasts entertainment programs. In May 2004, a new channel named MRTV-4 was broadcasted to public for a two-hour-a-day program schedule with the cooperation of Myanmar Radio and Television under the Ministry of information. In 2005, it broadcasted a six-hour-a-day program schedule with a looping system being introduced.
